name: Sunny Day Walk
description:
Collect little bird sprites as you explore the park with Sunny the bird.

Use the keys WASD to walk, left mouse to throw Sunny, right mouse to recall Sunny and Esc to quit the game.  A white ball ended up being Sunny in the final build but the model was crafted!

The idea is to use the impulse of throwing Sunny to reach higher platforms and therefore collect all the birds sprites.

The snakes make you jump higher but don't actually hurt you.

Made by Phloxy Fables, Guntler and GavinC for the GMTK21 game jam.
